results.title: Houttuynia cordata Facilitates Metformin on Ameliorating Insulin Resistance Associated with Gut Microbiota Alteration in OLETF Rats
results.text_hl: The current study examined the synergistic anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ effect of Houttuynia cordata extraction (HCE) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination in Otsuka @<m>DISEASE_Evans_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536380 @@@Long-Evans Tokushima@@@ Fatty (OLETF) @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang JH, Bose S, Lim SK, Ansari A, Chin YW, Choi HS, Kim H. Houttuynia cordata Facilitates Metformin on Ameliorating Insulin Resistance Associated with Gut Microbiota Alteration in OLETF Rats Genes (Basel). 2017 Sep 22;8(10):. PMID: 28937612

results.title: [Expression of aquaporin 7 in perirenal adipose tissue of Otsuka Long-Evans Tokushima Fatty diabetic rats].
results.journal: Beijing Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: Then the rest of the @<m>DISEASE_Evans_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536380 @@@OLETF@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into untreated group (@<m>DISEASE_Evans_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536380 @@@OLETF@@@ group, n=12) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@ treated group (@<m>DISEASE_Evans_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536380 @@@OLETF@@@/M group, n=12).
